card.name: All the Colors of the Dark
card.text: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. (Melds with all of your darkest fears.) --- (Back): Profondo Giallo

card.name: Profondo Giallo
card.text: --- (Front): All the Colors of the Dark
card.related: All the Colors of the Dark

card.name: Il Diavolo a Sette Facce
card.text: Target opponent exiles cards from the top of their library until they've exiled two nonland cards. Choose one of those cards. That player sacrifices all but X nonland permanents, where X is the chosen card's mana value. Then they lose life equal to the other card's mana value.

card.name: Sonno Profondo
card.text: Reveal your library. For each color and each combination of colors, you may put a card that's exactly those colors from among the revealed cards into your hand. Then shuffle. You have no maximum hand size for the rest of the game. Exile Sonno Profondo.

card.name: Live in Fear of the Beyond
card.text: Destroy target permanent. When you do, choose one — • Return up to one target Nightmare permanent card from your graveyard to the battlefield. • Exile target double-faced card from your graveyard and copy it. You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost. --- (Back): Città della Paura

card.name: Città della Paura
card.text: Città della Paura enters the battlefield tapped unless a creature died this turn. {T}, Pay 1 life: Add one mana of any color. --- (Front): Live in Fear of the Beyond

card.name: L'altro Inferno
card.text: Creatures you control gain vigilance until end of turn. After this main phase, there are X additional combat phases.

card.name: Rend the Mind Like Flesh
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell, Rend the Mind Like Flesh deals 1 damage to you. At the beginning of your end step, draw cards equal to the amount of damage dealt to you this turn.

card.name: Hush Hush, Sweet Alice
card.text: Ward—Pay {3} or discard an instant or sorcery card. Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, you may reveal a Nightmare card with lesser mana value from your graveyard or outside the game and put it into your hand.

card.name: To Torture the Duckling
card.text: Return target artifact card, target creature card, target enchantment card, and target land card from your graveyard to the battlefield. (You can't cast this spell unless you have legal choices for all its targets.)

card.name: Dreams of Drowning
card.text: Tap target creature and put one hundred +1/+1 counters on it.

card.name: Feticcio della Strega
card.text: Once during each of your turns, you may cast an instant or sorcery spell you own from outside the game.

card.name: Forlorn Gondola
card.text: Whenever Forlorn Gondola deals combat damage to a player, draw a card. Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, Forlorn Gondola becomes an artifact creature until end of turn. Crew 2

card.name: Painted Corpseflower

card.name: Untamed Potential

card.text: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains first strike until end of turn. You may have it lose all other abilities until end of turn.

card.text: Look at the top five cards of your library. Put up to two creature cards with mana value 3 or less from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)

card.name: PFG Draft Archetypes PFG
card.text: {W}{U} ENVISION Art is catharsis. Purge your fears and outlive your foes. {U}{B} TENSION Live on a knife edge and take advantage of the Nightmares in the dark. {B}{R} THROWBACK Play aggressively and know your copied throwback spells can recoup lost cards. {R}{G} SPELLSLINGER The mind rattles with gnawing potential. Let it out aggressively. {G}{W} LIFEGAIN Enjoy the fruits of the long, hot evenings and prosper as you gain life. {W}{B} TENSION Protect the dark things that flit when the sun sets, and ride evasive damage to victory. {B}{G} TOKENS Token creatures know no fear, leave no bodies, show no mercy. {G}{U} NIGHTMARES Paranoia breeds claws and teeth on Cibavo. Embrace the dark. {U}{R} ENVISION Are you a tortured genius, or a genius of torture? {R}{W} TENSION Attack aggressively, and your nightmares will split your opponent's focus.

card.name: Contaminated Aquifer
card.text: ({T}: Add {U} or {B}.) Contaminated Aquifer enters the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Haunted Mire
card.text: ({T}: Add {B} or {G}.) Haunted Mire enters the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Molten Tributary
card.text: ({T}: Add {U} or {R}.) Molten Tributary enters the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Paranoid Soundscape
card.text: Creature tokens you control get +1/+1 and have trample.

card.name: Nightmare (Tension) PFG
card.text: Flying

card.name: Death Calls at All Hours
card.text: Destroy target creature or planeswalker. Return up to one target creature or planeswalker card from your graveyard to your hand. --- (Back): The Waking Hour

card.name: The Waking Hour
card.text: As long as it's your turn, The Waking Hour has deathtouch. --- (Front): Death Calls at All Hours

card.name: Sinister Secretary
card.text: Whenever Sinister Secretary deals combat damage to a player, it envisions 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on it, or exile an instant or sorcery from your graveyard and you may cast a copy of it by paying up to 1 less.)

card.name: Tortured Expressionist
card.text: Vigilance When Tortured Expressionist enters the battlefield, it envisions 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on it, or exile an instant or sorcery from your graveyard and you may cast a copy of it by paying up to 1 less.)

card.name: Bambola di Vetro
card.text: Bambola di Vetro can't be blocked by Nightmares. When Bambola di Vetro enters the battlefield, it envisions 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on it, or exile an instant or sorcery from your graveyard and you may cast a copy of it by paying up to 2 less.)

card.name: Tormented Model
card.text: Haste When Tormented Model enters the battlefield, it envisions 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on it, or exile an instant or sorcery from your graveyard and you may cast a copy of it by paying up to 1 less.)

card.name: Feticcio Della Strega (Headliner promo)
card.text: Once during each of your turns, you may cast an instant or sorcery spell you own from outside the game.

card.name: Solvi di Finecco, L'Assassino (Bundle promo)
card.text: Unless a player has 5 or less life, Solvi di Finecco, L'Assassino has base power and toughness 1/1. Whenever a player casts or copies an instant or sorcery spell, they lose 1 life.

card.name: Locked Room of Vice
card.text: Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, target player gets a poison counter. (A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)

card.name: Inscrutable Vamp
card.text: Whenever a creature dies, you gain 1 life. At the beginning of your end step, if you've gained 3 or more life this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Inscrutable Vamp.

card.name: Shrieking Nighthawk
card.text: Flying, deathtouch Tension (Whenever you attack with X creatures with tension, create a tapped and attacking colorless X/X Nightmare creature token with flying if you haven't this turn. Exile it at end of combat.)

card.name: Citizen (Tension) PFG
card.text: Tension (Whenever you attack with X creatures with tension, create a tapped and attacking colorless X/X Nightmare creature token with flying if you haven't this turn. Exile it at end of combat.)

card.name: Doubt Is the Slow Knife
card.text: Discard your hand. For each card type among cards discarded this way, draw two cards.
